com.isotrol.impe3.api.content
Interface ContentLoader

All Known Implementing Classes:
ForwardingContentLoader, NRContentLoader, TransformerContentLoader
public interface ContentLoader

Content loading interface.

Author:
Andres Rodriguez

Method Summary
 ContentLoader forRepository(NodeRepository repository)
          Creates a content loader that uses an external node repository.
 Content loadNode(Node node)
          Loads a node as a content.
 List<Content> loadNodes(Iterable<? extends Node> nodes)
          Loads a collection of nodes as a list of contents.
 ContentCriteria newCriteria()
          Creates a new content criteria.
 ContentCriteria newCriteria(ContentType contentType)
          Creates a new content type-specific criteria.
 

Method Detail

loadNode

Content loadNode(Node node)
Loads a node as a content.

Parameters:
node - Node to load.
Returns:
The loaded content.
Throws:
NullPointerException - if the argument is null.

loadNodes

List<Content> loadNodes(Iterable<? extends Node> nodes)
Loads a collection of nodes as a list of contents.

Parameters:
nodes - Nodes to load.
Returns:
A list containing the loaded contents.
Throws:
NullPointerException - if the argument is null.

newCriteria

ContentCriteria newCriteria()
Creates a new content criteria. The criteria is created with the following flags:
  • Uncategorized contents: as specified by the portal.
  • Due contents: as specified by the portal.
  • Fetch bytes: no.
  • Use request locale: yes.

Returns:
A newly created content criteria.

newCriteria

ContentCriteria newCriteria(ContentType contentType)
Creates a new content type-specific criteria. The criteria is created with the following flags:
  • Uncategorized contents: as specified by the portal.
  • Due contents: as specified by the portal.
  • Fetch bytes: no.
  • Use request locale: yes.

Parameters:
contentType - Content type to filter.
Returns:
A newly created content query.
Throws:
NullPointerException - if the argument is null.
IllegalArgumentException - if the content type is not part of the portal.

forRepository

ContentLoader forRepository(NodeRepository repository)
Creates a content loader that uses an external node repository.

Parameters:
repository - Node repository.
Returns:
A specific content loader.
Throws:
NullPointerException - if the argument is null.
